**Meeting Overview**:  
The City of Dallas will hold a joint meeting of the Government Performance and Financial Management Committee and the Ad Hoc Committee on Pensions on November 7, 2024, at 1:30 PM. The meeting will take place in the Council Briefing Room on the 6th floor of City Hall and will be accessible both in-person and via video conference.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
The primary focus of the meeting will be a briefing on the report from the Independent Auditor regarding the Dallas Police and Fire Pension System and the Employeesâ€™ Retirement Fund, as mandated by Texas Government Code Section 802.1012. 

**Important Details**:  
The meeting will feature a presentation by Jeannie Chen, Specialist Leader at Deloitte, detailing the audit findings. This report is crucial for assessing the financial health and management of the pension funds, which are significant components of the city's financial obligations.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will review the auditor's report and may discuss potential recommendations or actions based on the findings. No specific approvals or decisions are indicated on the agenda, but the discussion may lead to future policy considerations regarding pension management. 

The meeting will be broadcast live and is open to public attendance, ensuring transparency and community engagement in the discussions.
